item.title: Bika Spotlight Search
item.description: Overview Bika Spotlight Search is a modern JavaScript application written with CoffeeScript and based on the BackboneJS framework. It communicates with Bika LIMS through plone.jsonapi.routes. See it in Action — —

item.title: Bika Commander
item.description: Overview Bika Commander is a cross platform web application based on Electron and ExtJS. It communicates with Bika LIMS through plone.jsonapi.routes. See it in Action — —
